attributes.action: Revise the Tax Rules and STOP Tax Evasion by the Monaco Millionaires.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are certain British people who exploit the Loopholes in the current Taxation system in order to deprive the Treasury of Hundreds of Millions, if not Billions, of Pounds over the years. The exploitation could be prevented by a simple piece of Legislation. Why hasn't this been done ?
